algorithm_technique: Bitwise XOR and AND operations, distributive property of XOR over AND
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the XOR sum of all pairwise bitwise AND operations between elements of two arrays.
problem_summary_technical: Compute the XOR sum of (arr1[i] & arr2[j]) for all i and j. This simplifies to (XOR sum of arr1) AND (XOR sum of arr2).
key_insights: The XOR sum of a list of numbers is the XOR of all its elements.
The problem asks for the XOR sum of `(a & b)` for all `a` in `arr1` and `b` in `arr2`.
This can be simplified using the property that `XOR(a_i & b_j)` over all `i, j` is equal to `(XOR(a_i)) & (XOR(b_j))`.
